name: Steer League
description:
GAME:

Jump in a game of Steerleague, ready to dominate the driving world! Become the worlds saver & be ready because the floor turns into lava frequently. Chose car-mythic superpowers and become a car hero you've never seen.
Once you reach level 35, you could create your own car-hero styles!

CONTROLS:

These can be changed in game.

H - Gun Slots
E - Fire
Enter vehicle - G
Leave vehicle - G
Drive - WASD or Arrow Keys.
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Jump
R - Reload
1, 2, 3, 4 - Weapon slots
Left shift - Run
CTRL - Crouch
Tab - Use mythical superpower
U - Recharge Vehicle Boosts
ESC - Check Challenges, Leave Games & Menu.

& Many more you'd have to change in game!
